comment: the second step of four-step reaction (see R00424, R00428+R05046+R05048+R04639) following after R00428 subsequently R05048
definition: Formamidopyrimidine nucleoside triphosphate + H2O <=> 2,5-Diaminopyrimidine nucleoside triphosphate + Formate
name: formamidopyrimidine nucleoside triphosphate amidohydrolase
